name: Mission Family Center
description: Mental Health Services for individual, group, & family therapy; case management; medication.
fullDescription: Mental Health Services for individual, group, & family therapy; case management; medication.
whatTheyOffer: Mission Family Center provides individual, family, parent and group therapy to children and adolescents with serious mental or emotional problems. They also offer early intervention for preschoolers and outreach to schools and community agencies in the area about children's mental health and parenting issues. Services are for Spanish speakers.
